DOC.detailed_description: Very data publish epidemiology hypoparathyroidism worldwide . None exist specifically France . Hypoparathyroidism could lead complication : e.g . symptomatic hypocalcemia , calcification ( brain , eye soft tissue ) , nephrolithiasis/nephrocalcinosis , renal insufficiency . Here , investigator plan collect data epidemiology , medication complication hypoparathyroidism France .
